abstract: Companhia Vale do Rio Doce will seek to raise about $15 billion in the biggest sale ever by a Brazilian company. The share offering from the world’s largest iron-ore producer is set to be priced on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: Companhia Vale do Rio Doce will seek to raise about $15 billion in the biggest sale ever by a Brazilian company. The share offering from the world’s largest iron-ore producer is set to be priced on Wednesday.

headline.main: Vale Looks to Raise $15 Billion in Offering
